name: Create a new databse item in Notion from new actions in Glide
description:
Every time a new action happens in Glide, a new database item will be instantly created in Notion.

The template is creating a list of users in Notion so it expects to receive at least user emails under a "current_user" variable - make sure it's called exactly the same in your Glide webhook otherwise you will have to map a different variable during the template setup.

The template also expects to have an "Email" column in your Notion database.
